Facade (Main client object)

class tutti_client.TuttiClient[source]

Bases: object

A facade class which communicates with Tutti server.

close()[source]

Closes connection with Tutti.works server.

async open(host: str, wsd_path: str = '/ducts/wsd')[source]

Opens connection with Tutti.works server.

Parameters

  • host (str) – Host name of Tutti.works server.

  • wsd_path (str) – Path from host root for obtaining DUCTS web service descriptor.

async reconnect()[source]

Reconnects with Tutti.works server.
